summary: The bill, titled the Protecting Access to Ground Ambulance Medical Services Act of 2025, aims to amend Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to ensure patient access to ground ambulance services under Medicare. It specifically addresses payment rates for ground ambulance services, delaying certain changes until January 1, 2028, and specifying percentage increases for services furnished between October 1, 2025, and January 1, 2028.  The bill was introduced in the Senate on May 7, 2025.
